recipe.title: Pineapple-Ginger Agua Fresca
ingredients: 5 cups 1-inch cubes peeled ripe pineapple (from 1 large pineapple)
2 teaspoons (or more) grated peeled fresh ginger
Ingredient info: Choose a golden yellow pineapple that smells sweet and yields very slightly to the touch.
instructions: Puree pineapple, 1 cup water, and sugar in blender in batches until smooth. Pour into 8-cup measuring cup. Mix in 3 cups water and 2 teaspoons ginger. Cover; chill until cold, about 4 hours. Strain pineapple mixture into pitcher, pressing on solids in strainer. Add more ginger to taste. Fill tall glasses with ice. Pour agua fresca over.
